Address.label: Address
Address.value: 281 TRESSER BOULEVARD,TWO STAMFORD PLAZA, 16TH FLOOR, STAMFORD, Connecticut, 06901, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hexcel designs and manufactures high-performance composites, including carbon fibers, for use in commercial aerospace, defense, and other industrial markets. Generally, around 70% of revenue is from the commercial aerospace end market, 17% of revenue is from the defense end market and 13% of revenue is from other industrial end markets. The company operates under two segments: composite materials and engineered products.

value.name: Don Morrison
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
